== Introduction ==
This page provides a guide to installing and configuring <nowiki>[[http://www.nexuiz.com/|Nexuiz]]</nowiki>, a multiplayer first person shooter freely released under the GPL.

== Installation Instructions ==

Install the <nowiki>[[apt:nexuiz|nexuiz]]</nowiki> from the Universe <nowiki>[[Repositories|repository]]</nowiki>.

== Configuration ==
=== Desktop Effects ===
Before starting the game you may need to disable <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/9.04/desktop-effects/C/compiz-configure.html|Desktop Effects]]</nowiki>, or you could get display errors or the game could run too slowly (this may be not needed on an nVidia card with proprietary drivers).
=== Direct Rendering ===
Nexuiz is a graphically demanding game which requires <nowiki>[[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Direct_Rendering_Infrastructure|Direct Rendering]]</nowiki>.

If following command returns "No", see <nowiki>[[Video]]</nowiki> to install the proper drivers for your video card.
<pre>
glxinfo | grep direct
</pre>
